data.eml:eml: Description of a new species and first records of two species of Leuropeltis Hebard, 1921 (Blattellidae, Pseudophyllodromiinae) from Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lopes, Sonia Maria, Khouri, Andréa (2010): Description of a new species and first records of two species of Leuropeltis Hebard, 1921 (Blattellidae, Pseudophyllodromiinae) from Brazil. Zootaxa 2545: 33-38, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.293368
